reviewText: I'm a New Yorker who's obsessed with the UK. This series is basically a reality show about London Tube employees. It shows them carrying out their day-to-day activities. One of the episodes showed a guy training to be a train driver. Another episode focused on unruly customers. The series also shows the painstaking maintenance that is performed on the system. Two of the episodes (which are included as Extras) are devoted to the Tube's recovery from the 2005 terrorist attack. There is a newer Tube series that I hope they release on DVD.
